column1: Local Foods////Let s face it Houston has so many great restaurants. Competing for customers is a "bear" but Local Foods has nothing to worry about. Do you know why? They know what they are doing
column2: they do it well and they do it with passion. First of all their food is    HEALTHY.. ...Did you hear that? HEALTHY
column3: MEAN AND LEAN..now Houston is no longer the fattest city in the nation but we were up there last year. Do you want to find a place where you eat well
column4: they treat you with a smile and kindness and you leave having eaten a healthy meal?  Come to local foods. You might run into me. I plan to visit often to fulfill my wellness plan!
